example.eg: She saw a field full of corn.
example.egtrans: 她看到田里长满了玉米。

example.eg: The players ran out onto the rugby field.
example.egtrans: 球员们跑上了橄榄球场。

example.eg: The dogs played in the field beside the house.
example.egtrans: 狗在房子边的草地里嬉戏。

example.eg: She's an expert in her field.
example.egtrans: 她是她那个领域里的专家。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 领域, 范围, 专业

example.eg: She's one of our field agents.
example.egtrans: 她是我们的现场代理人之一。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 野外工作的, 实地的, 现场的

example.eg: I prefer field events to track events.
example.egtrans: 与径赛相比，我更喜欢田赛。

example.eg: He's just finished several weeks of field operations.
example.egtrans: 他刚结束了几周的野外军事行动。

example.eg: They harvested a crop of field hay.
He's a field hand and works at the farm.
example.egtrans: 他是农场工人，在农场工作。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 田间劳动的, 种地的

example.eg: The field of applied linguistics has always interested me.
example.egtrans: 应用语言学领域一直吸引着我。

example.eg: She reached the finishing line well ahead of the field.
There's an oil field ten miles west of here.
example.egtrans: 这里以西十英里处有一块油田。

example.eg: He was always with his troops in the field.
example.egtrans: 他总是和手下的士兵一起上战场。

example.eg: The Red Sox bat while the Yankees play in the field.
example.egtrans: 红袜队击球，扬基队防守。

example.eg: Bernie Williams plays center field for the champions.
example.egtrans: 伯尼·威廉姆斯为冠军队打中外野。

example.eg: A field of snow lay round about.
example.egtrans: 周围是茫茫一片雪地。

example.eg: She painted a tree against a field of blue.
example.egtrans: 她在蓝色的底色上画了一棵树。

example.eg: It produces a strong magnetic field.
example.egtrans: 它会产生强大的磁场。

example.eg: Required fields are marked with an asterisk.
example.egtrans: 必填字段标注有星号。

example.eg: The home team is currently fielding.
example.egtrans: 目前是主队防守。

example.eg: He fielded the ball with dexterity.
They fielded a very competent team.
example.egtrans: 他们派了一个实力非常强的球队参赛。

example.eg: The candidate fielded a number of questions from the reporters.
The UN has fielded troops in Sierra Leone.
example.egtrans: 联合国已经派部队入驻塞拉利昂。

example.eg: The athletic field had been damaged by the rain.
I keep binoculars by the window to look at birds.
The ball flew into center field and Jeff caught it.
You can be center field in today's game.

dsense.name: depth of field
dsense.guideword: (part of an image in sharp focus)

example.eg: I set the camera aperture to obtain maximum depth of field.

dsense.name: field day
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (great opportunity to enjoy yourself)

example.eg: The revelation about the Prime Minister's love life was a field day for the tabloids.

dsense.name: field goal
dsense.guideword: US (football: three-point goal) (橄榄球: 三分球)

dsense.name: field goal
dsense.guideword: (basketball: while ball is in play) (篮球)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 实地指南, 野外指南

dsense.name: field hockey
dsense.guideword: mainly US (sport: hockey played on a field)

example.eg: Field hockey is played with a ball, not a puck.
example.egtrans: 曲棍球打的是圆球，并非冰球。

example.eg: They set up the field hospital a short distance away from the fighting.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 卫生营，野战医院，战地医院

dsense.name: field house
dsense.guideword: (athletics: for storage, dressing) (运动场周围的)

example.eg: Cinderella's fairy godmother turned four field mice into white horses to pull the coach.
Joe's field of study is French literature.
Sometimes the policies dictated by the company's headquarters make no sense to the field offices.
it was essential to conduct a field study to get to know the bird species better in their own habitat.
The class went on a field trip to the zoo.
example.egtrans: 全班去了那家动物园做实地考察。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 实地考察, 现场考察, 实地见习

example.eg: Smithers is in the Amazon doing field work on endangered species.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 现场考察, 实地勘察工作

example.eg: From our field-based observations, we conclude that native species of grasses are in decline.

dsense.name: fieldstrip [sth], field-strip [sth]
dsense.guideword: mainly US (cigarette butt: leave no trace of) (烟头)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 拆解丢弃, 拆分丢弃

example.eg: The injured player was carried off the football field on a stretcher.
I drove the length of a football field before my car broke down.
example.egtrans: 我开车驶过了一个橄榄球场的距离，车就抛锚了。

example.eg: He likes to work in the field, rather than behind a desk.

dsense.name: landing field
dsense.guideword: (airfield: where planes take off and land)

example.eg: The locals called it "The Airport" but it was really nothing more than a grass landing field.
He hit the ball straight to left field.
He played left field professionally for 10 years.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 跳脱常规的, 不寻常的

example.eg: We can only compete if we're all on a level playing field.

dsense.name: magnetic field, magnetic intensity, magnetic field strength,magnetizing field, magnetizing force

example.eg: My major field of study is Greek, and I am minoring in art history.
He lost his leg in the war, when his platoon strayed into a minefield.
Don't discuss religion with them; it's a mine field!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 充满隐患的环境（状况等）

example.eg: We plan to drill five exploration wells in this oil field.

dsense.name: open-field
dsense.guideword: historical (farming: using open fields) (历史用语)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 出乎意料, 意料之外

example.eg: Simon has gained a reputation for playing the field.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 乱搞男女关系, 滥交

example.eg: The children used the playing field for football, rugby and hockey.

dsense.name: rice field, ricefield, rice paddy, paddy field, paddy

example.eg: Because they are irrigated by flooding, rice fields are breeding grounds for mosquitoes.
I usually stand in right field when my class plays baseball.
Can I play right field today?

dsense.name: take the field
dsense.guideword: (sportsperson: join the games or begin a game) (指运动员)

example.eg: After a long delay, the teams finally took the field.
Talia is good at most sports, but she really excels at track and field.
Discus is a track and field event.

dsense.name: track and field athletes, track-and-field athletes

example.eg: Track-and-field athletes include runners, sprinters, and pole vaulters.
